Name: Bulgarian Split Squat
Instructions: Stand with one foot elevated behind you on a bench, lower your body by bending your front knee, and push through your front foot to return to the starting position.

Name: Weighted Lounge
Instructions: Step forward with one leg, lowering your body until both knees are bent at 90-degree angles, then push through your front heel to return to the starting position.

Name: Leg Press Machine
Instructions: Sit on the machine with your feet on the footplate, push the footplate away by extending your knees, and then lower it back down.

Name: Wall Sit
Instructions: Lean against a wall with your feet shoulder-width apart, slide down until your thighs are parallel to the ground, and hold that position.

Name: Leg Extension Machine
Instructions: Sit on the machine with your legs under the padded lever, extend your legs forward, and then lower them back down.

Name: Standing Weighted Calf Raises
Instructions: Stand with the balls of your feet on an elevated platform, rise up onto your toes, and then lower your heels back down.

Name: Leg Press Machine Calf Raises
Instructions: Sit on the leg press machine with your feet on the footplate, push the footplate away by extending your ankles, and then lower it back down.

Name: Single Leg Box Jump
Instructions: Stand facing a box or platform, jump onto it with one leg, and then step back down.

Name: Barbell Hip Thrust
Instructions: Sit with your back against a bench, position a barbell across your hips, lift your hips off the ground, and squeeze your glutes at the top.

Name: Weighted Squat
Instructions: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, hold a weight (such as a barbell) on your upper back, lower your body by bending your knees, and push through your heels to return to the starting position.

Name: Cable Kick-backs
Instructions: Attach an ankle cuff to a cable machine, secure it around your ankle, stand facing the machine, and kick your leg straight back while keeping your core engaged.

Name: Romanian Deadlift
Instructions: Stand with your feet hip-width apart, hold a barbell in front of your thighs, hinge forward at the hips while keeping a slight bend in your knees, and then return to the starting position by squeezing your glutes and driving your hips forward.

Name: Single Leg Romanian Deadlift
Instructions: Stand on one leg, hold a weight (such as a kettlebell) in one hand, hinge forward at the hips while lifting the opposite leg straight behind you, and return to the starting position by engaging your hamstrings and glutes.

Name: Nordic Hamstring Curl
Instructions: Kneel on a pad or soft surface, lower your upper body by bending at the knees and hips, and use your hamstrings to pull yourself back up to the starting position.
